titleStmt.title: The speech of Hadgi Giafer Aga, embassador from the divan of Algier, to His Most Christian Majesty at Versailes together with the French king's answer to the said embassador.
titleStmt.author: Ja'far Aghā, hāji, fl. 1684.
Louis XIV, King of France, 1638-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.B. for Richard Mead,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
